needList.EnableHint: Add 'I need something...' button to chat log

hotKeys.EnableHint: Use Alt+<number> to quickly select Chat, Scenes, Journal, etc.

cheatSheet.Name: Cheat Sheet
cheatSheet.NameHint: Title of journal entry to show on Alt-/ (help) button.

debugMode.EnableHint: Enables browser console logging for the FoundryPLANT.
